metadata.description: Generali and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) are taking action to address the crucial challenges of climate resilience and adaptation with this panel discussion.
metadata.og:title: Sustainability Champions: Strengthening MSME Resilience

content.text: The Generali Group and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) are taking actionto address the crucial challenges of climate resilience and adaptation. Our collaboration draws attention to the growing threat of climate change and climate-related risks for MSMEs around the world. We want to focus on developing and strengthening innovative insurance solutions against these risks, to ensure the resilience of local markets and thereby contribute to the stability of global value chains.

How do climate shocks impact emerging markets, and what social implications do they have on MSMEs and vulnerable populations? How can the public and private sectors boost the resilience of MSMEs in developing countries? And what additional efforts can insurers make to ensure stability?
Join us on the2nd of December from 5:00pmfor our event:
“Sustainability Champions: Strengthening MSMEs for a Climate-Resilient Tomorrow”
at the Generali Offices in Berlin

items: Nicole Heidemeyer,Chief Operating Officer Cosmos Direct and Board Member Generali Deutschland Group
Jan Kellett, UNDP Head of Insurance and Risk Finance Facility (IRFF)
Dirk Meyer, Head of Directorate-General for Multilateral Development Policy, Transformation and Climate Federal at the Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

content.text: MSME resilience and global supply chains

items: Cedric von der Hellen, The Voice of German Industry (BDI)

content.text: Leaders dialogue on actions and programs undertaken for the promotion of new, resilient economic opportunities for MSMEs - with Q&A

items: Lauren Carter, UNDP Deputy Head of Insurance and Risk Finance Facility (IRFF)
Mirko Sartori, Chief Insurance Officer International Generali Group
Melanie Hauenstein,Director UNDP Representative Office Berlin

content.text: Bookmark this page!If you can't join in person, the event will bestreaming liveon our streaming pageand onLinkedIn Generali Deutschland.
